title: Quiz: Multiple Choice Formats
description: Test your knowledge with various quiz question types

questions.question: What are React components?
questions.explanation: React components are JavaScript functions (or classes) that return JSX to describe what should appear on the screen.

questions.question: Props in React components can be modified by the component itself.
questions.explanation: Props are read-only. Components must never modify their own props - this is a fundamental rule in React.

questions.question: Which of the following are valid prop types in React? (Select all that apply)
questions.explanation: All JavaScript data types can be passed as props: strings, numbers, functions, objects, arrays, and booleans.

questions.explanation: A React component follows this structure: function name, parameters, return statement, and JSX.
